code: import React,{useEffect}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Answer=props=>{const{verb,index,handleSubmit}=props;useEffect(()=>{const div=document.getElementById("input-".concat(index));const input=div.querySelector('input');input.addEventListener('keyup',pressEnter);input.focus();},[]);const pressEnter=e=>{if(e.key==='Enter'){e.preventDefault();handleSubmit(e.target.value);clearText(e.target);}};const clearText=div=>div.value='';if(verb.tense==='imperative'){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{id:"input-".concat(index),className:"answer-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"answer-input",type:"text"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"pronoun imperative",children:"-".concat(verb.pronounP)})]});}else{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{id:"input-".concat(index),className:"answer-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"pronoun",children:verb.pronounP}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"answer-input",type:"text"})]});}};export default Answer;
